articles.author: Aditya Saikrishna
articles.title: ESA to Steer Dead Satellite Back to Earth in Guided Re-Entry - Transcontinental Times
articles.description: ENGLAND: In a landmark endeavor, scientists at the European Space Agency (ESA) are preparing for a “first-of-its-kind” operation to guide a dead satellite safely back to Earth through a controlled re-entry. The satellite in question is the renowned Aeolus spa…
